page.title: Reposit√≥riUM Statistics
page.block:
The statistics are organized accordingly to the following levels:
  • Global - global usage, content and administrative statistics.


  • Community - community usage, content and administrative statistics.


  • Collection - collection usage, content and administrative statistics.


  • Item - item usage and administrative statistics.

page.title: Global
page.block: Global usage, content and administrative statistics.

page.title: Downloads - Time Series
page.description: Number of downloads in the period.

page.title: Downloads - Period
page.description: Number of downloads in the selected period.

page.description: Ranking of communities by number of downloads.

page.title: Searches - Time Series
page.description: Total of searches in the period.

page.title: Searches - Period
page.description: Total of searches in the selected period.

page.title: Search Phrases
page.description: Ranking of the most searched words.

page.title: Communities and Collections
page.description: Total number of communities and collections.

page.title: Submitted Items
page.description: Total of items submitted in the period.

page.title: Items per community
page.description: Total of items submitted by community.

page.title: Items per collection
page.description: Total of items submitted by collection.

page.title: Publication Year/Community/Collection/Item Type/Number
page.description: Number of items by publication year, community, collection and item type.

page.title: Items per type
page.description: Number of items submitted by item type (Field Type of Dublin Core Metadata Element Set).

page.title: Items per access type
page.description: Number of items submitted by access type.

page.title: Items per publication year
page.description: Number of items submitted by publication year (or submission, in case of items not yet published).

page.title: Items per Author
page.description: Ranking of authors by the number of submitted items.

page.title: Files
page.description: Number of files submitted by format.

page.title: Users
page.description: Number of users registered in the system and the number of users with email updates service

page.title: Workflow - Operations
page.description: Number of items processed in every step of the workflow.

page.title: Workflow - Time Series
page.description: Number of items processed, by operation, in the period.

page.title: Current Workflow
page.description: Number of submitted items that still are in acceptation process.

page.title: Workflow Validator
page.description: Submited items in metadata validation step - by operator

page.title: Logins
page.description: Number of logins in the period.

page.title: Logins top
page.description: Ranking of users by number of logins in the selected period.

page.title: Request Copy
page.description: Number of requested copies of items in restricted access or embargoed in the period.

page.title: Request Copy
page.description: Number of requested copies of items in restricted access or embargoed in the selected period.

page.title: Request Copy - Items Ranking
page.description: Ranking of items by number of request copies in the selected period.

page.title: Request Copy - Submitters Ranking
page.description: Ranking of submitters by number of request copies in the selected period.

page.title: Access Type Errors
page.description: Items with inconsistencies between the information in the metadata and the access permissions.

page.title: Agents
page.description: HTTP Agents marked as spiders

page.title: Origin
page.description: IPs Country of origin

page.title: IPs
page.description: IPs marked as spiders

page.title: Weblog analysis
page.description:
Flagged agents - IPs detected on Weblog wich agent are already flagged on system. High probability of beeing spider.
Probable agents - IPs with suspicious agent names.
Robot trap - IPs that accessed robot trap.
Robots.txt - IPs that accessed robots.txt.

page.title: Sessions analysis
page.description:
Inside each hour, identifies IPs with a cadency of views and downloads less than 1 minute, with more than 10 hits and with high number of sessions (greater than 95% of the number of hits)
First - First hit on hour.
√öltimo - Last hit on hour.
Tempo - Time between first and last hit.
Hit - Number of views and downloads.
D.Hit - Distinct hits (number of distinct accessed objects).
Cadency - Cadency of on hour. (Time / number of hits)
Sessions - Number of sessions.

block.name: sessoes
block.title: Session analysis (only IP's flagged to be watched)

block.name: sessoes
block.title: Session analysis (excluding IP's flagged to be watched
